mapper.select: SELECT u.*, t.team_name as team_name, pos.position_name as position_name FROM users u INNER JOIN teams t on u.team_code = t.team_code INNER JOIN positions pos on u.position_code = pos.position_code ORDER BY t.team_code
SELECT u.user_name AS user_name, u.user_id AS user_id FROM users u INNER JOIN teams t ON u.team_code = t.team_code WHERE t.team_code = #{teamCode}
SELECT u.* FROM users u INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM PARTICIPATIONS WHERE conversation_id = #{conversationId}) p ON u.user_id = p.user_id
